caption:
“Faith is not feeling; it is fidelity.”

Reflection:
Feelings rise and fade like the tide, but fidelity stands unmoved. Faith endures when emotion grows silent.

Commentary:
This quote teaches that faith is commitment, not sentiment. True belief persists even in dryness, trusting God through both joy and emptiness.
